features.item: Garfield Bay view home on a large lot
Easy access to public beach and marina
Nestled in the trees, nice landscaping

house_listing.comments: This Lake Pend Oreille view home is nestled in the trees overlooking Garfield Bay just minutes from Sandpoint. Large daylight rambler on a large, nicely landscaped lot. RV hook-up, covered boat storage, 2-car attached garage plus an additional storage shed. Great opportunity to enjoy the lake!
